programme.title: The Power of a Phrase
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke examines the power of the catchphrase "winds of change".
programme.medium_synopsis: Alistair Cooke examines the power of the catchphrase whether it be "uranium from Africa"; "winds of change"or "I was brainwashed".
